channel.title: I have SC emotes, but need help with them

item.title: I have SC emotes, but need help with them
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

add them to your client.java but make it on an emote tab by getting the case number of the tab you want and adding that into it. that way when you click that emote tab it does the emotes if they are wearing the cape.

Read full topic

item.title: I have SC emotes, but need help with them
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

[code]public void capeEmote() {

   if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2702) { //hitpoints
          stillgfx(444, absY, absX);
          stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
          stillgfx(199, absY, absX);
      stillgfx(293, absY, absX);
	setAnimation(1500);
          txt4 = "A hitpoints skill cape.";

playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
playerLevel[3] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[3]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}
}[/code]
I have whole list of those, but just added 1…
Where should I put it? Somekind of class file?
Client-side?
Server-side?

How could I trigger those emotes?
I don’t have “Cape” in my Emotes tab.

Read full topic
item.source: I have SC emotes, but need help with them
